Global Variables

viewRatings.views.view_star_rating(request)[source]¶

This method is used to retrieve star ratings from database to display each doctor’s rating according to their service (serviceR), behaviour (behaviourR) and Accurate Diagnosis (accdR).

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – It’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

If the database doesn’t contain any ratings, it returns an HTML page

showing a text: “There are no ratings at the moment”.

Else,

If a patient is logged in, it returns an HTML page that displays doctor ratings. If a doctor is logged in, it returns an HTML page that displays doctors ratings. If there are no ratings, the logged in user will view an HTML page showing text.

Return type

HttpResponse.
